spellrack.name: Arcane Bolt
spellrack.description: Magical bolts of energy streak toward the target model.

spellrack.name: Flashing Blade
spellrack.description: The spellcaster immediately makes one basic attack with one of its melee weapons against each enemy model in its LOS that is in the weapon's melee range. These attacks are simultaneous.

spellrack.name: Jackhammer
spellrack.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup immediately makes one basic melee attack.

spellrack.name: Jumpstart
spellrack.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup that are currently in its Control Range stand up and are no longer stationary. Affected models can turn to face any direction. Models that were knocked down this turn are not affected by Jumpstart.

spellrack.name: Open Fire
spellrack.description: Target Cohort model in this model's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can immediately make one basic ranged attack. A model can be targeted by open fire only once per turn.

spellrack.name: Arcane Blast
spellrack.description: A magical energy blast radiates from a single point to strike all models in the AOE.

spellrack.name: Explosivo
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction model's ranged weapons gain Damage Type: Arcane. If the affected model directly hits and boxes an enemy model with an attack from a ranged weapon, center a 3" AOE on the boxed model, then remove that model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 10 magical blast damage roll.

spellrack.name: Return Fire
spellrack.description: When target friendly Faction model is targeted by an enemy ranged attack, after the attack is resolved the affected model can make one basic melee or ranged attack, then Return fire expires. Return Fire lasts for one round.

spellrack.name: Banishing Ward
spellrack.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on target friendly model/unit expire. Affected models cannot be targeted by enemy spells or animi.

spellrack.name: Carnivore
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 to melee attack rolls against living models. When an affected model destroys a living model with a melee attack, the destroyed model is removed from play and the spellcaster can remove d3 damage points.

spellrack.name: Countermeasure
spellrack.description: While within 5" of target friendly Faction model/unit, enemy models cannot make ranged attacks.

spellrack.name: Dash
spellrack.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction warrior models activating in its Control Range gain +1 SPD. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Unstoppable. Dash lasts for one turn.

spellrack.name: Deadeye
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains an additional die on each model's first non-spray tanged attack roll this turn.

spellrack.name: Dragon's Blood
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 ARM. When an affected model is disabled by a melee attack, the attacker suffers the Corrosion continuous effect. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spellrack.name: Electrical Blast
spellrack.description: Electrical Blast causes electrical damage. Warjacks damaged by Electrical Blast suffer Disruption.

spellrack.name: Energizer
spellrack.description: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is currently in its Control Range can immediately advance up to 2". Energizer can be cast only once per activation.

spellrack.name: Escort
spellrack.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range gain +2' movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more warjacks in its battlegroup are within 3' of it.

spellrack.name: Execration of Blackest Night
spellrack.description: While in the spellcaster's command range, enemy models suffer -2 to their accuracy rolls. Execration of Blackest Night lasts for one round.

spellrack.name: Host of Shadows
spellrack.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup gain Ghostly. Host of Shadows lasts for one turn. (A model with Ghostly can advance through terrain and obstacles without penalty and can advance through obstructions if it has enough movement to move completely past them. It cannot be targeted by free strikes.).

spellrack.name: Lightning Tendrils
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Resistance: Electricity. Affected models' melee weapons become RNG 2 and gain Electro Leap. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spellrack.name: Mage Sight
spellrack.description: Place a 5" AOE completely within the spellcaster's Control Range. While a model is within the AOE, models in the spellcaster's battlegroup ignore forests and cloud effects when drawing LOS to it and ignore Stealth when attacking it.

spellrack.name: Onslaught
spellrack.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction models beginning their activations in its Control Range gain Relentless Charge for one turn. (While advancing as part of a charge, a model with Relentless Charge gains Pathfinder.

spellrack.name: Razor Wind
spellrack.description: On a critical hit on a warjack or warbeast, fill in the unmarked damage boxes or circles on the last column or branch damaged.

spellrack.name: Redline
spellrack.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 SPD and +2 to melee damage rolls and can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus. At the end of each of its activations, the affected warjack suffers d3 damage points.

spellrack.name: Repudiate
spellrack.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Repudiate immediately expires. When an upkeep spell expires as a result of Repudiate, the model maintaining the spell suffers d3 damage points.

spellrack.name: Silence of Death
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 to it's melee attack damage rolls and Takedown.

spellrack.name: Tactical Supremacy
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Reposition [3"]. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition [3"] can advance up to 3", then its activation ends.).

spellrack.name: Veil of Mists
spellrack.description: Place a 4‚Äù AOE cloud effect anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control range. This AOE does not block friendly Faction models' LOS while in the AOE friendly Faction models gain Pathfinder and can move through obstructions and other models if they have enough movement to move completely past them.

spellrack.name: Watcher
spellrack.description: Once per turn when an enemy model advances and ends its movement within 6" of the spellcaster, you can choose a Cohort model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range. That Cohort model can immediately make a full advance toward the enemy model and then can make one basic attack targeting the enemy model.

spellrack.name: Arcane Shield
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +3 ARM. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spellrack.name: Bullet Dodger
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction model gains +2 DEF and Dodge. (A model with Dodge can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.).

spellrack.name: Curse of Shadows
spellrack.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 ARM. A model can advance through an affected model if it has enough movement to move completely past its base.

spellrack.name: Death March
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction unit gains +2 MAT and Vengeance. (During your Maintenance Phase, if one or more models in a unit with Vengeance were damaged by enemy attacks during the last round, each model in the unit can advance 3" and make one basic melee attack.).

spellrack.name: Deceleration
spellrack.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction models gain +2 ARM against ranged and magic attack damage rolls. Deceleration lasts for one round.

spellrack.name: Fire For Effect
spellrack.description: Boost the attack and damage rolls of target friendly Faction model's first ranged attack each activation.

spellrack.name: Fog of War
spellrack.description: Models gain concealment while in the spellcaster's Control Range.

spellrack.name: Full Throttle
spellrack.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus that activation. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup gain boosted melee attack rolls. Full Throttle lasts for one turn.

spellrack.name: Gallows
spellrack.description: When an enemy model is hit by this attack, it can be pushed d6" directly toward Gallows' point of origin.

spellrack.name: Gravity Bomb
spellrack.description: If the target model is directly hit by Gravity Bomb it suffers -2 SPD and DEF for one round. Enemy models entering the AOE, or beginning their activation in the AOE suffer -1 SPD. The AOE is a hazard that stays in play for one round.

spellrack.name: Hand of Fate
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains an additional die on attack and damage rolls. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

spellrack.name: Hex Blast
spellrack.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

spellrack.name: Occultation
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction Model/Unit gains Stealth. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spellrack.name: Positive Charge
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction warjack gains +2 to melee attack and melee damage rolls. While within 3" of the affected warjack, friendly Faction non-warjack models gain +2 on melee attack and melee damage rolls. Positive Charge lasts for one turn.

spellrack.name: Rift
spellrack.description: The AoE is rough terrain and remains in play for one round. While within the AoE models lose and cannot gain pathfinder.

spellrack.name: Spellpiercer
spellrack.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, the weapons of friendly Faction models/units gain Blessed and Damage Type: Arcane. Spellpiercer lasts for one turn.

spellrack.name: Wind Rush
spellrack.description: The spellcaster can immediately make a full advance and gains +2 DEF for one round. Wind Rush can be cast only once per activation.

spellrack.name: Wind Wall
spellrack.description: The spellcaster cannot make ranged attacks after casting this spell, and non-magical ranged attacks targeting it automatically miss. While completely within 3" of the spellcaster, models cannot make ranged attacks and non-magical ranged attacks targeting them automatically miss. Wind Wall lasts for one round.

spellrack.name: Blur
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +3 DEF against ranged and magic attack rolls. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spellrack.name: Force Hammer
spellrack.description: Instead of suffering a normal damage roll, a non-Incorporeal model Force Hammer hits is slammed d6" directly away from the spell's point of origin and suffers a POW 12 damage roll. Collateral damage from this slam is POW 12.

spellrack.name: Superiority
spellrack.description: Target friendly Faction Warjack gains +2 SPD, MAT and DEF and cannot become knocked down.
